articles.title: 'Extremely rare' 500-year-old textiles stun Antiques Roadshow expert - BBC
articles.description: The items include a bedspread and pillowcases sewn by Elizabeth I and her ladies in waiting.
articles.content:
An Antiques Roadshow expert was left stunned when a never-before-seen Elizabethan textiles collection dating back 500 years appeared during filming.

articles.title: Bono admits his 40-year marriage to his wife Ali has been 'a relay race' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The U2 frontman, 62, said that at one point in the 1980s Ali 'wanted to jump' from their union after he became less present during their home life.
articles.content:
Bono has revealed his 40-year marriage to his wife Ali Hawson has been 'like a relay race,' while detailing the moment their relationship came close to breaking point.
